name: Quintorius, Field Historian
originalText:
Spirits you control get +1/+0.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

rulings.text: If two or more cards leave your graveyard as a single event, Quintorius’s last ability will trigger once. If they leave your graveyard as separate events, it will trigger once for each event.
